channel.title: GitHub Models Inference API on Sujith Quintelier
channel.description: Recent content in GitHub Models Inference API on Sujith Quintelier

item.title: github: GitHub Actions: AI labeler and moderator with the GitHub Models inference API
item.description:
GitHub has released two new GitHub Actions that utilize the GitHub Models inference API to assist open source maintainers. These include an AI assessment comment labeler to help streamline issue triage using trigger labels.

  • Source: GitHub
